abstract: HSBC said on Wednesday it might consider pulling out of a $6.3 billion deal to buy Korea Exchange Bank , a move analysts say would heap more pressure on South Korean regulators.
lead_paragraph: HSBC said on Wednesday it might consider pulling out of a $6.3 billion deal to buy Korea Exchange Bank , a move analysts say would heap more pressure on South Korean regulators.

headline.main: HSBC Says It May Pull Plug on Korean Bank Deal
